Message:
The world was saved,
but at great cost.

The thought of
dying terrified me,
but if Master’s with me...

As I gazed at him next to me,
he raised the Staff into the air.

He gave me a smile and said,
“I won’t let you die.”
My body is beginning to heal?

Why...? It can’t be—
he’s giving his life to...
No! If you do that...!

Master’s lifeless body
falls to the ground.

I immediately raise
the Staff into the air.

If I give this life back,
I can save him!
But...

Why? Why isn’t
anything happening?!

Isn’t the Staff supposed
to save people—

to protect the ones
important to us?!

There’s no one more
important to me
than him!

If now’s not the time to
use this power, when is?!
I still have time!

So, I beg you...
answer my prayer...
Save Master...!

Take my life and
give it back to him!!

I cry...and I scream...
but the Staff doesn’t
respond.

The Staff gives its power
to the ones who love the
world and the people in it.

There’s only
one person I loved—

only one person
I wished to save.

So the Staff no longer
listened to me.
